amendment.description: Amendment sought to prevent a provision of the bill that would block BLM resource management plans from going into effect if failing to implement the plans would limit BLM's ability to meet its multiple use obligations, including providing opportunities for hunting, fishing, and outdoor recreation.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prevent a provision of the bill that would block BLM resource management plans from going into effect if failing to implement the plans would limit BLM's ability to meet its multiple use obligations, including providing opportunities for hunting, fishing, and outdoor recreation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tsongas amendment (A092) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 241 (Roll no. 474).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tsongas amendment (A092) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 241 (Roll no. 474).

House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A092) offered by Ms. Tsongas.
